Others: Volksparkstadion Hamburg will host 5 matches during UEFA EURO 2024, including Croatia vs Albania on 2024-06-19.
The match will take place on 2024-06-19 at 15:00 local time.
Stadium gates will open 3 hours before kick-off.
Public transport is recommended as the most convenient, fastest, and sustainable option for matchday travel.
No parking is available at Volksparkstadion Hamburg on EURO 2024 matchdays.

Professional cameras and cane umbrellas are not permitted inside the stadium.
